html: 1.24.17  2:01 am   why do you never capitalize your answers to questions?

1.24.17  1:50 am   Just to get this out of the way, I love all of the stuff you've made. Now my question is why don't you make more great stuff consistently? I understand that you don't have the time to put in the amount of work hours you'd need to make each thing great, but could that not be solved by colaberating with other poeple, making a business out of your great mind?
